== Introduction ==
Team for translating the various pieces of Ubuntu into Anishinaabemowin (Ojibwe / Ojibway / Ojibwa / Odaawaa / Oji-Cree / Saulteaux).

== Contact ==
Mailing list: https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-l10n-oji <<BR>>
Team Administrator: TonyYarusso

== How to Contribute ==
* Translate strings listed at https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/lucid/+lang/oj
* Connect with speakers and gather information through them
* Notify us of anyone you know of who can help
* Let the children know about Ubuntu, as the upcoming generation is beginning to be proud of their language again

== Projects ==

== Launchpad Membership Policy ==
Our Launchpad team page is located at https://launchpad.net/people/ubuntu-l10n-oj.  You do not need to have a LP account to help, it is just very useful for certain aspects.  Working through the mailing list or another personally with someone who does have an account is fine too.
